title: Any records indexed to Kristi A. Saylor

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all records indexed to the name Kristi A. Saylor from 2021 to the present. Please include any records, files, communications, reports, supplemental reports, 911 calls, dispatcher logs, dash cam, audio, body cam, photographs,  and investigative records. Per the denial of my previous requests for not being specific enough I am specifying that I am looking for records that the Police Department has indexed to the name of Kristi Saylor and which would be filed in 2021 to the present. I know these records exist as I contacted the police department due to harassment. I am also looking for any records relating to complaints or reports made about 272 West Ludlow St. Summit Hill PA 18229 from 2017 to the present.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kristi Keeler

title: Any records indexed to Kristi A.Saylor (Carbon County District Attorney)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am once again requesting any records held by Weissport Police Department indexed to Kristi A. Saylor. There has never been a response (Weissport Police Dept) and District Attorney Greek told me in 2022 they would be released “when the new Chief of police takes office.” I have never received anything and the Office of Open Records has sent my appeal to the District Attorney.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kristi Keeler

communications.subject: Mississippi Public Records Act Request: Jayson lee traffic stop
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Mississippi Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I would like bady cam and dash cam footage of stop on chester lee rd

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jayson Martin Lee
